1221.content:
With my Sweatpants back on, I waddled out of the store, head down. A sales clerk, petite with the kind of firm ass that people apparently bounce quarters off of for fun, hollered at me if there was anything she could help me with, but I just kept on trucking. Unless you're willing to pay for my food, then I don't know what kind of help you can give me, I thought.

As I made my way to the food court, I could feel every part of my body jiggling. Why was I doing this? Why was I eating so much? Just because it tasted good?

Yeah, because it tasted good.

And maybe I didn't actually want to get fat, but when the fried smell of the food court hit my nostrils, my stomach let out an epic, impatient growl. I didn't know where to start, so I got a little bit of everything.

I got a double cheeseburger and a milkshake from one place, which I ate while ordering a fried chicken meal from another place.

"Will that be everything?"

"Um, could you, um, double that?"

"I'm sorry, double what?"

"Could you double the whole order? Basically two of everything?"

The clerk, a skinny pimply girl with goth eye makeup, just looked at me without expression. I blushed, but I stood firm, not backing down from the amount of food I wanted.

"So you want two Cokes, two orders of fries, two quarter pound chickens, and two cole slaws?"

I nodded the affirmative, and took my tubby ass over to a table, where I proceeded to put all the food inside me. Yum. I belched and felt a whole lot better. Who needed jeans anyway? A good pair of sweatpants and a belly full of grub was all a girl really needed. With that thought, my gut whined at me again. Feed me.

With a grunt, I hauled my butt off my chair and looked around the food court. What next?

I quickly waddled up to Dairy Queen, still practically starved and willing to empty my wallet there if need be. I didn't love being fat, but getting fatter was a fair trade for being able to stuff myself with their heavenly food.

"Hi, could I get... uh... three cheeseburgers, a chicken sandwich, a flamethrower grillburger with cheese, two orders of fries..." The cashier was giving me and my fat gut a dirty look, and I hadn't even gotten to the ice cream yet. "Two DQ sandwiches, a Blizzard, a peanut butter parfait," I was getting to the point where I didn't think I could eat it all, but I kept going; I'm allowed to be fat. I'm wearing The Sweatpants, for Christ's sake. I was almost finished, but I had one more behemoth to order. "...and an Oreo Brownie Earthquake. Two, actually."

I absolutely refuse to tell you how much money went to Dairy Queen from my wallet that day, but I'd ordered so much food that I needed a rather large bag to carry it all. My food court usually doesn't use bags.

waddled back to my table, sat down, and dug in. I was alarmed with how quickly I'd finished all three cheeseburgers; it was under five minutes. The chicken sandwich was gone in one. The grillburger with cheese ate up three minutes, which was reasonable considering how much food was stuffed into it. The fries didn't stand a chance, and before I knew it I'd moved onto my ice cream feast. I was starting to get full, but hey, I still wasn't too fat for The Sweats and that's all that mattered.

For those of you who may not know what a DQ sandwich is, I'll tell you: it's soft serve ice cream between two round chocolate wafers. Basically, it's an orgasm, and I happily gobbled down two before moving on to the Blizzard. For ice cream full of cookies, it was rather underwhelming, which made my progression to the peanut butter parfait even more delicious. As peanuts, hot fudge, and fatty ice cream slid into my belly, I moaned and nearly cried when I found that it was gone. All that was left was the pair of Oreo Brownie Earthquakes. Basically, it's a huge brownie, with a few more brownies, covered in ice cream and hot fudge, whipped cream on it as well, and to top it off it was covered in crushed Oreos.

And I was about to eat two. Damn, I'm a porker. I stuffed myself with those more slowly to savor them, which made it all the more horrifying when I ran out of food and saw that I was sitting in front of a wasteland of eaten food.

Getting up and holding my overstuffed belly...

132.content:
I remember one morning, when I realized I needed to go shopping, again. I had just awoken from one of my other favorite pastimes besides eating, sleeping. Getting up with a wobbly stretch I looked at the clock and saw I had slept in quite late, even for a Saturday. Saying goodbye to my oh so snuggie PJ’s as I took them off, I searched my closet for a more mid-day appropriate outfit.

Searching I found a gorgeous button up shirt I had not worn for quite some time. Feeling sorry for the neglected outfit, I decided today was its lucky day and made to put it on. Feeling as tight as most of my wardrobe did nowadays, I willed the shirt to stretch around my new tubbier body and managed to get the first few buttons fastened. What I hadn’t realized was how long it had actually been since I had gotten the shirt and the change in clothing sizes I had been through since then.

The shirt grew more constricting as I was halfway through the buttons, forcing me to do the unthinkable and actually try to suck in my new big gut. I held my breath as long as I could, giving the eye-catching outfit some leeway, I managed to get to the button second from the top, when I couldn’t hold my breath any longer and violently exhaled a deep lungful of air.

This is when two things happened at once: almost the entire row of buttons bullied by my bellies bulge popped off the shirt launching at high velocity and plunking of the mirror before me. Simultaneously a loud that SHRRrrip came from behind me, as the back side of the ensemble had enough of trying to stretch around my body and simply ripped apart from the tension, leaving the shirt in shambles.

“Holy shit!” I exclaimed realizing what had just taken place. “That was pretty cool!” I marveled as I witnessed how I absolutely wrecked the outfit. It was too bad to. I had actually liked that outfit, but its sacrifice would not be in vain. It inspired me towards how I would now spend the rest of the afternoon bursting through my backlog of clothes that were to tiny to handle the new me. Excitedly I searched my bedroom for my next victim…

But maybe I didn’t want to spend the day by myself. I wondered if I should call Dan over. I’m sure that he might enjoy this exhibition as much as I did. I finally decided to…

1321.content:
I had to share this with someone, and the only other person I could think of that might appreciate this spectacle as much as I did was Dan.

I dialed him up while removing the scraps of clothes that still hung from my frame.

“Hey you’re up early...for once.” He groaned groggily. It was true enough that my sleeping in was one of Dan’s pet peeves, but hey I loved my sleep even if it did mean I wouldn’t wake up till around one in the afternoon.

“Ha-ha, I was just sitting here alone thinking of the big surprise I had in store for you... But now maybe you won't get to see it.” I snapped back.

“Whoa. A big surprise from you? That's sounds like something I got to see!” Dan said his voice already rising in excitement.

“Well, now there’s an entrance fee...”

“What? Fine. A box of crispy creams it is, I’ll be right over”

“Hmmm sounds, good see you then...”I purred as I hung up.

I could hardly wait to put on the little show I had in mind for Dan, so I took a shower to quickly pass the time. In the shower soaping myself up and down I began spending the next few minutes exploring any new flab I discovered. Here and there I was noticing a little bit of new chub, much to my delight. Now finished, and freshly scented I began drying myself with the largest fluffiest towel in the house, the only one that could actually wrap around me at my size.That's exactly when I was interrupted by the sound of the doorbell ringing. I decided to answer the door in towel alone. Hey, I was going to redress in clothes that were too small for me anyways, this was just saving time. So still moist from the shower, I answered the door wrapped (tightly) in the towel.

“Helllllloo…” I said dragging out the syllables seductively. I had to laugh as his jaw uncontrollably popped open.

“Uhhh,.. Tttttickets for the show…”he said frittering as he offering the box of custard and crème filled.

“Oh, for me, mmmm thanks...” I said as I took the box from him. As I let him inside I added "And you can close your mouth, you just have incredibly good timing it's not that kind of show.... yet.”

Setting the doughnuts aside for later, I instructed Dan to wait outside my bedroom while I got ready. It goes without saying, he was quite obedient.

Inside I dressed in a body-hugging form-fitting pair of bra and panties and some other clothes that were more than a smudge to small. Sucking in my gut to the best of my ability I opened the door and ushered him in.

“So… is that a new outfit?” He asked earnestly, trying to score some good boyfriend points. He was puzzled trying to see what I could have possibly planned

“Actually it's pretty old.” I said still withholding my breath. “In fact I think it's got a few rips in it” I said slowly exhaled letting my gut push forward and press tightly against the shirt but not fully releasing yet. As I heard the sounds of fabric starting to year I could see it was having the desired effect on Dan, time for the grand finale. “But you know what they say; sometimes ending is better than mending and this shirt is going out of style in a big way.”

Whoosh I breathed out letting it all hang out. *Shripp * Went my shirt as it the bottom tore to make room for my stomach. *Shrap* Went the front of my pants as they gave way under my stomachs bulk.

With my shirt in tatters I was left semi-nude for Dan’s eyes to ogle over. He was speechless.

"So…cool right? Come on say something" I said after a few seconds of silence.

“Holy shit!” he uttered much in the same manner as I did. His gaping mouth formed into one large smile obviously a sign he’d enjoyed it.

"Well worth the price of admission I take it?" I asked turning about so he could glimpse my beautiful backside as well as my front.

“He'll yeah it was!” He said hungrily. “What do you want to do next?”

“Hmmm” I said as I thought. Those donuts sounded pretty good right now, and this had been the longest morning before I've had breakfast. Then again with him lying on the bed like that admiring me like I was an angel, it would be kind of cool to "test the bed-springs out” with him and see I'd they'd buckle under my bulk....

142332.title: A Lot of It

Hells yeah!
143.content:
"Well Nana, I hope you enjoy the new exercycle!" A birthday present from her favouritest and fattiest grandkid; she needed to keep fit in her old age. "I gotta get going now."

"Oh Little Nikki, don't go yet." She had always called me Little Nikki, and had not seemed to notice that the name now fit as well as my leggings and tank top, which left my belly button free as a bird, jiggling up and down with any sudden movement.

"Nana, I have to go. I have things to do."

"Like what? What's more important than family?"

Um, food? More food? A whole huge heap of food?

Visions of turkey legs and pizzas and ice cream sandwiches and basically everything that wasn't sugarplums danced through my head. And the only reason sugarplums weren't in there was that I had no frikkin' idea what they were supposed to be.

My belly grumbled, voicing my thoughts when my mouth wouldn't. Dammit tummy! Can't a girl have private thoughts? I guess most of my thoughts were about food these days, like apple pie and burritos and... GRUMBLE.

"You're hungry! You must stay for dinner!"
143.title: To Leave Or Not Leave

Run for it!

1431.content:
I was taking the bus back home, taking up a whole row of seats while the other passengers gave me dirty looks.

I couldn't stop thinking about Nana's offer. Free food! Lord knows I had expensive taste, expensive basically being the same as enormous. And served to me! None of this getting up and walking around nonsense! And good old fashioned home cookin'! I never really ate stuff like that anymore. In the name of variety, I simply had to get back to Nana's. I had to make it up to her.

I dinged the cord, but the stop just wasn't coming fast enough. I got out of my seat and thundered up to the driver as fast as I could, all my fatty bits oscillating, whole lotta shakin' goin' on, hitting every seat and person that I passed with my big bulging hips. I knocked one guy's headphones off.

"Hey, watchit!"

I didn't reply. I had to get to that driver.

I got to him, huffing and puffing from my adventure through the vehicle, as the bus waited at a red light.

"Driver, (pant pant) you have to (pant) let me out."

Maybe it's just part of being a bus driver, but he seemed unfazed by the mammoth young woman hovering over him like some sweaty god.

"The stop is right up there, just past the light."

"No, I need off. Now."

"I can't let you off until we get to the stop."

"But we're not even moving!"

"Sorry, you'll have to wait."

He started to inch forward, waiting out the interminable red light, and stopped again. My anxiety at getting out, plus my exertion from the trip, must have thrown off my equilibrium. I fell on to the driver, crushing him against the window.

"Aaaaah! Get off me! Oh god, I don't want to die!"

What a drama queen! You would think he had never had a half-ton human being on him before.

"Okay, just let me..."

I struggled to get up, and smacked him in the head with my boob. His head thudded against the window with a fairly hard smack.

"Ow! Oh god!" His hand reached out from under my lard gut and hit the button to open the door. "Get out! Please! I'll do whatever you want if you leave!"

"That's all I wanted." I had gotten off of him. My tank top had ridden way up, now sitting right under my boobs. The driver had his eyes glued on my massive stomach. "Hey, eyes up here buddy."

I was about to leave this nightmare bus, when I saw that the driver had a small lunch under his seat. A sandwich. A coke. And... pudding? Fatty goop?

"You said I could have whatever I want?"

A few seconds later, I was exiting the bus, chomping down on the driver's sandwich, big gut jiggling. I almost got stuck in the door on the way out, but I powered through, with the determination to get back to Nana's. I swear, the whole bus rocked back and forth when my body burst out of the door frame.

The light turned green as I was crossing the street, and a car stopped an inch away from me. The horn honked and the driver, a withered looking bitch, stuck her head out the window.

"Hey, Whaley-o, get off the road!"

I slammed my hand on her hood, which clearly startled her.

"Hey, I'm walking here!"

I always wanted to say that.

Sandwich done, coke can popped, sugary drink going down, holding up traffic, URRRRRRP.

Now, how to get to Nana's?
1431.title: Stop The Bus!

choices: Nana got me another helping from the kitchen; after all, I was still tired!

14313.content:
I slowly waddled down the sidewalk back to Nana's house, my wide hips and huge booty taking up the whole sidewalk. It took me twenty whole minutes to slowly make my fatty way back to my grandma's home. I rang the doorbell and she answered quickly. "Oh, hi, Nikki."

"Thought I'd... I'd take you up on that... dinner offer," I wheezed, exhausted from my journey.

"Oh, Nikki, honey, you look exhausted!" She said, "Come in and sit down, I'll get you a plate. The food's just finished, and Grandpa's not coming home tonight."

I slowly waddled into the dining room and pulled two chairs- well, they were small, so maybe I needed three- up into a line, sitting on all of them. They creaked ominously below my quarter-ton bulk as Nana entered with two plates, one for her and one for me. The one she placed in front of me contained about three, maybe four times as much food as hers. At least she recognized that "Little Nikki" was still a growing girl.

I was given garlic bread, rolls covered in butter, mashed potatoes, corn, and two big chocolate chip muffins. I gobbled down the bread quickly, slowing down a bit n the rolls to savor them (and to look like less of a glutton in front of Nana). I shoveled the mashed potatoes into my mouth in no time, along with the corn. I gazed lustily at the first muffin before grabbing it and taking a huge chomp out of it. Nana always baked the best muffins, and she was only getting better; when I'd stuffed both of them into my stomach, however long it took, it was too soon.

I wasn't full yet; no, I wasn't even almost satisfied. My belly whined for more, more, more!
14313.title: I'll Get You a Plate

"Thanks, Nana," I smiled lovingly as she came back with a meal that was nearly identical to the first, but a bit smaller. I was disappointed; less rolls and only one muffin? Still, I wasn't going to be a brat to my beloved grandmother, so I gobbled it down without complaint.

1431311112.content:
"God fucking dammit..." I muttered under my breath as I felt my hips become wedged into the doorway.

"Oh, honey, you see?" Nana said as she approached her stuck granddaughter, "If you keep going the way you have been, it won't just be my house. Think about the places you won't fit! School, stores... your boyfriend's house..."

Knowing that all that would do was turn Dan on, I smirked, but didn't let her see it. "Well, a lecture's useless now. Can you get me out?"

"Well, I don't know how, dear," I heard her say worriedly, "You appear to be quite wedged in there."

"Do you have, like, butter or something?"

"Why, Nicole Amelia Brown! This is NO time to have your mind on even more food!"

"Well, Nana, I meant that we could use it to slip me out, but if you're going to be..." I resisted to urge to call my grandma a bitch, "...like that, then I'll just get out all by myself!" I thrust my hip forward a bit and I honestly couldn't tell if I'd moved or not. I put my hands on the outside of the door and tried to push myself out, but nothing was happening. My belly rumbled softly and I noticed that Nana's neighbors were starting to look at me.
1431311112.title: I Hate It When She's Right

choices: My barbecue binge made me bloated enough to destroy Nana's doorframe. Freedom!
The firefighters showed up.
14313111121.content:
These neighbours, a middle-aged couple with pleasant if confused looks on their faces, came over to see me. As they approached, I caught a whiff of something in the air.

"Um, excuse us," said the wife, "but, um, do you, well, require assistance?"

"We don't mean to judge now," continued the husband, "we're not the judging kind, it just looks like you could use a little help and we're always glad to help out a fellow human being."

I barely registered his kindly yet incessant rambling. I had identified the smell in the air. The soft rumbling of my belly recurred, only much less soft.

"Is that barbecue?"

The wife's smile dropped, replaced with a look of bewilderment, which just as quickly gave way to her initial look of smiley concern.

The husband said, "Yes, we're cooking up a mess of meat, cleaning out the freezer. I tend to buy a lot of meat on sale, stockpile it, no use in buying meat at full price when you can-"

I cut him off. "Can I have some?"

"Oh," he said, at a loss for words.

"Just a little. I'm so... concerned. I'm scared, because of stuck and all that." My stomach revved up like a Harley.

"Now now, don't you worry. If food is what you need, food is what you'll get. We'll get you fed, calm your fears, and get you out of that doorway."

They hustled off, and my Nana piped up from behind me.

"Did you just tell the Richardsons to go get you more food? Nicki, do you really think that's what you should be doing right now? Eating more? Didn't you have enough of my cooking?"

"Oh Nana, I love you, but please butt out." I shook my butt back at her for emphasis, feeling it jiggle as I did so.

"That's it! I'm calling the fire department! I don't know what else to do!"

As Nana departed into her house, the Richardsons returned, each carrying a big plate containing hamburgers, sausages, pork chops and chicken wings. I started to drool. This was a weird fucking day, and I was stuck, again, but I was not about to complain.

"Now I hope you like burgers, sausages, pork-"

"Yeah yeah, I like everything. Thank you thank you thank you. Now let me at it."

The Richardsons held the plates out as I snatched the items off of them and stuffed them in my mouth. The married couple, judging by the looks on their faces, didn't seem to believe what they had gotten themselves into, but their polite personalities forbade them from saying anything.

I ate every item on those plates and burped proudly. I was getting really full, but that amazing smell was still in the air.

"Is there any more?"

"Now, hold on a minute," said Mrs. Richardson, "we're hoping to have supper ourselves, and we were thinking of inviting our friends the Grantas over, so we can't just give you all-"

I injected as much fear as I could into my voice. Someone give me a fucking Oscar.

"I'm so, so scared. Will I ever get out of this doorway? Will I ever have my life back?" I paused to burp a couple times. "Will I ever get to eat a hamburger again?"

"Okay, now don't you cry," said Mr. Richardson, picking up on the quaver in my voice, "you'll get what you need."

"Honey, I don't think that's a good idea."

"Nonsense Pam! Whatever it takes to calm her down. Once you're calm, you'll be ready for us to get you out of that door, right?"

If by "once I'm calm," you mean "once all the barbecue is inside me," then yeah, I'll be ready.

What I actually said was, "I think so. I need to be brave, but I'm sooooooo scared."

This convinced the Richardsons.

"And make them cheeseburgers this time!"

It took two more trips from them, with the plates overflowing both times, but I ate every piece of barbecued meat. My face was a mess of sauce and gristle, my hands were sticky, and Mrs. Richardson looked completely aghast. I snorted and moaned and burped in ecstacy. I downed the last hotdog and burped so loudly I couldn't hear what Mr. Richardson said.

"Sorry, didn't catch that."

"I asked if you were feeling brave now."

"Oh for god's sake Rick, she just ate every last ounce of our meat! Quit coddling her!"

"I am feeling much better now," I said, ignoring Mrs. Richardson, "I think I'm ready to (ugh-hic-buurpppp) get out of here."

"Okay. Let's do it to it."

I held out my arms, and the husband and wife each grabbed one, pulling with all of their strength.

Your daughter, I mentally snarled. "Uh, it was hypothetical. So, about that dinner..."

I placed a hand on my belly and shook my head. "Oh, no, I can't..." I said in mock meekness. "I've been trying to cut back on the food." And by that I mean I've been trying to make myself as fat as a whale.

"Oh, darling," Nana reassured me, placing a hand on my back, "You're beautiful just the way you are. Please stay and have dinner."

I smiled. "Well, if you insist..." I followed her into the kitchen and noticed that the stove was already in use. "Were you already making something?"

Nana sighed. "Well, I spent all day making a big dinner for your grandfather, since you know how much he likes to strain himself at dinner, but now he's out with his golf buddies all day long and I don't want this all to go to waste..."

1432.title: If She Insists

choices: "How about I get the neighbour boys to try pushing you through?"

1433.content:
"Okay Nana, if you insist!" Hoo boy, time to get my feed on!

I lumbered down a narrow hallway towards the kitchen. I don't know what it was about my Nana's house, but it was so small. I guess her and Grampie didn't take up a lot of room, so they didn't really notice it, but I bumped into a small table and a bookshelf on my way, knocking a picture of me as a little girl off the table and a bunch of cookbooks off the shelf. Nana was following behind me, picking up after my destruction, which was good, because I was not stopping for anything.

Well, not anything except getting stuck in a doorway.

"Nana, I think I might be stuck."

My heavy hips were plugging up the whole door frame. I had charged in so eagerly, I hadn't even noticed how narrow it was. God, how do my grandparents live in this ridiculous house?

"Oh... oh dear. Are you sure?"

I placed my hands on the frame and tried to push my way out. All I heard was an ominous creak from the walls, but I didn't budge an inch.

"Yeah, pretty sure." My tummy rumbled, again. Seriously stomach, not a good time.

"Oh, you sound like you haven't eaten in ages. Let me get you a little something to peck on."

The rooms were connected in a circular fashion, so that Nana could take a long route around, through the living room and the spare bedroom, ending up in the kitchen. She appeared in front of me with a concerned look on her face. She was eyeing me up and down, gauging my predicament. She started to cluck to herself under her breath, and saying "oh dear oh dear oh dear..."

"Um Nana, weren't you going to get me a snack?"

"Of course, of course! Don't mind me, I get..." She focused on my predicament. "Um, distracted in my old age."

She shuffled over to the cupboards.

"Now, I'm baking bread, rolls, muffins and cake. None of that will be ready for awhile, but-" She pulled a blue package from the cupboard. "We do have a box of Oreos."

"GIMME GIMME GIMME!"

"They were always your favourite as a little girl, so we always keep some in the house in case you visit."

"GIMME NOW NANA!"

"How many would you like?"

"THE BOX THE BOX!"

"Oh... okay."

Nana handed over the box of cookies to her porky hippo of a granddaughter, a.k.a. yours truly, and watched her rip open the bag and begin stuffing cookies two at a time, all while being stuck in the doorway of a house. My tank top was riding up, slowly but surely, as I pigged out. I finished off each and every glorious creamy cookie sandwich and dropped the empty box to the ground, belching.

That was good. But not entirely satisfying.

"Are the baked goods done yet?"

"Well dear, it's only been about a minute since you asked, so... no."

"What am I supposed to do until they're done? I don't know if you noticed, but I'm kind of trapped in your teeny door here."

I was being a bit of a brat, but I couldn't help it; being at Nana's always made me feel like a kid again!

"Well dear..."

We had never really been close in high school, but we had enough in common that getting me fat wasn’t the only thing we talked about. I warned her that hanging out with me was going to make her fat. All I did was eat, and since Tayla and I had become such fast friends, that meant she was learning how to pick up the pace. Seeing someone fatter than her pigging out constantly probably made her feel better about upping her intake. Tayla’s fat girl instincts were there, just buried under a healthy dose of shame—we’d see how long that lasted.

But if anything, she was the one who was so insistent about keeping us literally surrounded with food at every opportunity. Her grudge against Sienna Collins and the oddly specific, infinitely arousing idea of me squashing her gave her ample reason to keep me well fed. Every time we went out to the beach we’d bring coolers of ice cream and sodas, we’d practically empty hot dog carts that they had upshore. She was getting at least a little exercise ferreting snacks to me in and out throughout the day—even if it wasn’t enough to keep that big belly of hers from blimping out.

I know I wasn’t.

I was currently plopped on three of the Burger Shack’s chairs, ass end slowly rolling towards the edges of the outer two. Wrappers and discarded packaging littered the fucking table. It was like a greasy graveyard for everything I’d stuffed into my fat face since I’d sat down. Well, we’d sat down. Tayla wasn’t exactly as innocent in the carnage as she’d probably liked to have hoped.

“We’re supposed to making you fatter, Nik.” Tayla rued mournfully, my jiggling jostling a little burp out of her, “I want to be able to fit into the dorm room and maybe get out of my Mom’s house.”

“Come to the Fat Side, Tayla~” I purred in a deep voice, jiggling my belly for emphasis, “It! Is! Inevidable!”

“You’re ridiculous.” Tayla giggled, dipping her fries in her milkshake and taking a big greedy bite, “Oh shit shit, here she comes.”

Out from behind the counter, I looked for the fresh face of our tormentor turned tormentee—Sienna Collins. Our high school bully and body shamer extraordinaire. She was our waitress today, and had been just about every time we’d come out. She’d been forced to watch me stuff my face, and she couldn’t even say anything about it to me! Watching her get all red in the face, steam practically pouring out of her ears, was priceless—hands down the best entertainment a fatass like me could ask for. Even if I did miss her superb commentary about my body that (and I quote) “placed somewhere between an avalanche of pizza dough and an elephant crammed into a pair of sweatpants”

“Oh boy is there.” Tayla answered for me, turning gleefully towards our tormentor, “Does it look like our girl Nikki is done?”

151312221211221221.content:
Okay, obviously the biggest roadblock here is that Sienna Collins didn’t fucking like us.

I wasn’t really sure she liked anybody. I mean yeah she had friends and she’d had lots of boyfriends, but the girl was just a bitch. Like, just one of those confrontational people who doesn’t really get along with anybody? You ever met anybody like that? Well put an admittedly cute little brown bob on them and give them a nice round butt, and then you have Sienna. Tayla and I spent a lot of time discussing how to actually get her to hang out with her to get her fat, and the one thing that kept coming up is the fact that she’d never, ever fucking hang out with us.

It took us another week of continuing on as we had been in order to get a good idea of how to proceed. And surprise surprise it took us seven whole days of thinking, on and off between meals and other topics of conversation, that we should just ask her to hang out with us.

So, using my aspiring English Major fingers, I typed out this long message about how Tayla and I were sorry about being such bitches and making her job hard. And how maybe we could have been nicer and how high school was over blah blah blah, put the past behind us, blah. I made sure to throw in a couple of lines that made us seem extra petty and bitchy (which, to be fair, we kind’ve were, and were definitely going to keep it up) and we offered to take her out to lunch.

And… okay, I’ll be totally honest, I was expecting her to tell me to fuck off. In fact, I was kind of looking forward to getting a super long, very indepth message about how I was a landwhale and how I was going to die before I was thirty. Something up to the same caliber of (and I quote) “the fact that you and I are even in the same orbit just proves that there’s one thing you haven’t managed to get as round as yet, but I’m holding my breath until the day you to pull the moon in on the tide and crush the eastern seaboard, you colossal planetary fatass.”

But instead of that masturbatory fuel, I instead got three very short, curt messages.

Lol what?
Okay.
Where/when fatass?

And my disappointment was palpable. But on the other hand, it was a lot easier than Tayla made it sound. With the way my big blonde buddy had been talking, we would have had to get on our hands and knees and beg. And girls my size didn’t do so hot on our knees. For that kind of thing, anyway.

We all agreed that the beach was the best place to meet up. Sienna had been very clear about not wanting to meet at the Beach Shack. I figured it was because she already spent plenty of time there, working as a waitress and all, so I hardly blamed her. But the truth of it was, and I wouldn’t find this out until later, Sienna had gotten sick of eating the food there. Snacking on all that greasy grub was what got her that starter belly and, looking back, it made sense that she wanted to avoid it. I mean, not to me, but whatever.

In the month that had passed, I had gotten almost too fat for my bikini. My huge tits were pouring out of the cups, the edge of my round pink nips out on display. I looked like enough of a white whale already, with my pale doughy avalanche beach bod. I had cracked six fifty a little over a week ago, and had been riding high on that accomplishment.

“This… didn’t… suddenly get… any easier…” I wheezed, lugging the extra thirty pounds I’d picked up since last month with all the grace you’d expect of a baby elephant, “Tayla… holy fuck… slow down…”

“Sorry…” Tayla managed to part from her ice cream long enough to look behind her as I puttered along, “Nervous.”

No kidding. Ever since I told her that the plan was on, Tayla had been binging like a beast. Her fat girl, comfort-eating nerves had been triggered by the thought of actually going through with her plan, and she’d gone into overdrive. As evidenced by her new swimsuit—a black one-piece that she hopefully wouldn’t literally pop out of by the time the day was done.

We looked pretty beachy—I had on a big stupid hat and sunglasses, while Tayla let her long hair blow free. Even if we didn’t weigh almost a half ton together, I’d like to think that people would have turned heads to look at us. We were hot stuff!

Literally, unfortunately. Lugging around a couple hundred extra pounds of cuddlefluff meant that I was sweating like a hog. All the ice cream in the world couldn’t have cooled me down after having to roll myself out of Tayla’s mom’s car, waddle down the pier, and kick through the sand with my chunky feet.

“Well well well, if it isn’t the whale pod.” Sienna Collin’s stupid fucking voice carried over the sea breeze, “I thought I smelled chicken fingers.”

Tayla and I had come to the conclusion, on one of our many sleepovers that led to way too much food and fat talk, that Sienna had been avoiding the beach because of her extra weight. That was why we hadn’t seen her outside of the Shack since that first time. And looking at her now, in a two-piece bikini, we believed it. She had softened up a little, mostly in the bottom half. Her legs had thickened up and her butt was a little bigger. There was even a little chub on her tummy—her short stature meant that those twenty pounds went to all the right places in the most expedient way possible.

“Sienna!” I gasped, struggling to keep my wind, “Hey!”

Our meeting was… awkward. How were three people—the bully and the bullied—going to suddenly meet up and pretend like nothing had ever happened between them? Or at least, try not to acknowledge the fact that Sienna had once told Tayla that if she didn’t shape up she’d be a contender for second place for “biggest girl in school” right after my right butt cheek? Do we hug, do we high five… do we hand shake? It was a real dilemma.

“So…” Sienna clicked her tongue, putting her hands on her wide hips. Her eyes were hidden behind her own pair of sunglasses. No doubt she was looking at all of either of us—out, loud, and on display, “Haven’t seen you guys around the shack lately.”

“Yeah, we’ve been trying to cut back on the Shack.” Tayla touched her larger stomach instinctively, running her hand up and down its outer rolls, “Been eating there a lot…”

“Yeah, I noticed.” Sienna snarked, “What, find some other place to clog up?”

In all honesty, we’d abdicated from going to the Shack (instead frequenting the rest of our beach-town eateries and opting to explore our options a little) so that we would really be able to drink in Sienna’s size. There was no question about it—she was definitely porking out, and it had to be from working at that burger joint.

And we haven’t even started fattening her up yet! Tayla had cried one night in another one of our planning meetings, hyped up on milkshakes and sugar think of the possibilities, Nikki! Four years of making Sienna Collins fat! Can you imagine?!

And looking at her then… I really could.

“Actually, we did!” I waddled close and put my arm around Sienna’s shoulder, forcing her into the side of my belly as I held my mortal enemy close, “We figured you’d like it—it’s not far from here!”

“Oh great, wouldn’t want you two to exert any energy.” Sienna wretched at being so close to my (and I quote) “disgusting hogbeast body”

“Oh, Sienna—you’re such a kidder.” I smacked her on the shoulder a little too hard

Fuck. Feeling her this close to my body, literally being able to see how much she hated how fat I was. It was pretty hot. Whether we got to kick her down the Path of Fatass or if she just got grossed out by how much we ate, I have to be honest, I was gonna have fun either way…

Pop’s is, as you’ve probably guessed, an old-school ice cream parlor nearby. Which was great because, as I’m sure you know by now, you will literally never hear me turn down ice cream. It’s one of the staples in my diet of being a colossal lard mountain.

We’d discovered the place in our week-long sabbatical from Sienna’s place of work and were more or less pleased with what we’d found. Decent distance from the beach, great chair size, and decent enough portion sizes. And by that, I meant, I could still order five sundaes and still be begging for more. This wasn’t exactly the place for uber-fatasses like me, but I wouldn’t have turned it down for anything short of a buffet.

“Like, aren’t you going to put something else on, Nikki?” Sienna made a disgusted face, pointing to my exposed gut as it rolled deep over my knees, “This looks like a family place.”

“You could probably fit a family in here.” I jiggled my belly proudly, “Are you gonna put on some pants, Big Butt?”

“Hardly.” Sienna scoffed at the name, storming forward, “I don’t have a reason to—I don’t look like Captain Ahab’s worst nightmare rolled into a bikini, begging for attention with chocolate syrup on top.”

Ohhhh fuck that was the good stuff. A deep, satisfied little grunt escaped me as a familiar tingle tickled my thighs. I tried not to get too excited just yet—I felt like the bucking from the payoff of our first little visit with our old bully would shatter Tayla’s couch a little earlier than projected.

Tayla and I toddled in behind Sienna, her round rump leading the way. And oh yeah, there were plenty of stares. I weighed six-and-a-half hundred pounds, dressed in a glorified set of paper towels. You bet there were stares. Tayla hurried ahead of me and pulled up two chairs for me to plop down on (again, big chairs) and a pretty sizable table for the three of us to sit at.

“Jesus Christ, Nikki, how are you not dead yet?” Sienna folded her arms over her little belly self consciously, “You’ve got to weigh like a thousand pounds.”

“Only up to six-fifty-seven.” I panted, legs aching after a laborious waddle up with only two snack breaks, “Maybe we’ll break six sixty with all this ice cream.”

“I’ll fucking bet—if a moment on the lips, a lifetime on the hips were true, I’d think your right buttcheek alone was so old that it served as a border for the Underground Railroad.”

Gooooood dammit this was going to be hard.

“Who’s ready to order?” Tayla asked nervously as the two of us stared each other down, “I am so ready to order…”

15131222121122122112.content:
As much of a hedonist as I can be, even in the face of some of my favorite inadvertent fat talk, I could manage to keep myself under control. It wasn’t easy, but I didn’t have much of a choice. If I fucked up an opportunity to help put some pounds on Sienna’s skinny frame, it was worth delaying a huge, bucking orgasm until later, when it wouldn’t have been wildly inappropriate.

We managed to talk Sienna into ordering a Sunday Sundae. That was what they called about five scoops of ice cream over whipped cream and a banana. And we did it by not telling her what it was. Tayla just asked “do you want a Sunday Sundae” and Sienna was like “yeah sure whatever” because she figured when I said that I’d take three of them, that I was just a fatass.

Oh God you should have seen her face when it came out.

“Ho-oly shit.” She whistled, “I can see why you girls like this place.”

“They make good appetizers.” I drummed my fingers along my exposed stomach greedily as my three were set in front of me by a confused, concerned waiter who couldn’t stop staring at me, “I figure that should be enough for you.”

“Yeah, okay.” My short tormentor snorted, “Whatever I don’t eat, you fatasses can split.”

I couldn’t help but smile at my idea of the very definition of a win-win situation.

Anyway, so it wasn’t as awkward as it was on the beach—the three of us had gone to high school together for four years, and there were a lot more stories there than just her picking on us. There was plenty of common ground between us (narrow, crumbling ground) that we could explore as we made our way to the bottom of our ice cream dishes.

“So, like, do you still hang out with your friends?” Tayla asked pleasantly, struggling to maintain a pace with her sundae slower than the one that my presence had instilled in her over the past month, “I know we’re graduated, but, like… beach week?”

“No.” Sienna rolled her eyes, “That’s high school shit. I’m done with that.”

“Oh no—a war between the different, interchangeable kind of plastics.” I said in a bitchy, fake voice, “Whatever will the history books say, Sienna?”

“Shut up, lardass.” The smaller girl pointed her spoon at me before diving deep (deep) beneath the remaining dollops of ice cream, “Like, whatever, okay people drift apart after you graduate. It’s part of becoming an adult—which is what some of us turn into when we graduate.”

“It’s been like two months.” I snarked, “You just turned eighteen in January.”

“Whatever, okay?” Sienna bristled a bit at my probing, “Just… give it up, okay?”

I had gone through a rough patch with my weight and self-image enough to know comfort eating when I saw it. And even if I didn’t, Tayla did it at the drop of a hat. So seeing Sienna start taking big bites of her ice cream sundae told me that the real source of whatever was driving her to Chubsville Station was whatever happened between her and her friends. And what had kept skinny little Miss Popular from hanging out with anyone other than us—her favorite fat targets from high school.

“Like you gave up on ever fitting into anything other than a circus tent, freakshow.” Sienna finally said after a moment of poignant silence for her fallen high school social status, “Jesus Christ, what do they fill the dish with air? That was nothing!”

“I always feels that way, doesn’t it?” Tayla looked mournfully at her own emptied dish

“I’d say order me another one, but I’d hate to take money away from the Save the Whales poster child over there.” Sienna looked at my direction, “Right, Shamu?”

In the small curl of her smile, I was given infinite reasons to question the legitimacy behind Sienna Collins accepting our invitation to go get ice cream. And at the moment, I had no idea what the little tug at the corners of her lips meant. All I knew was that she hadn’t left yet, and she might have been throwing a hissy fit, but she wanted to be here with us. At least for now.

“Big words for a skinny little shit in the splash zone.” I said, narrowing my eyes

And believe it or not…

151312221211221221121.content:
This is where it gets a little unbelievable.

Not because, you know, I was more than six hundred pounds of brown-haired, big-assed, barrel-bellied beluga. And definitely not because Sienna Collins and I were in the same room and not talking shit about each other because, believe me when I tell you, there was a whole lot of that going around. If anything, you should believe that the most.

But (and I never thought I’d say this) Sienna, Tayla and I had a pretty good time.

Don’t get me wrong, I still hated her guts. She was a snarky, mean bitch who had done her best to make my life in high school a living hell. And she’d done the same, to a lesser extent to Tayla. We didn’t feel bad about Sienna’s friends and we couldn’t care less about the fact that she had a shitty job, and her disgusted faces that she made as our bellies rolled out onto the table was just icing on the cake (for me, anyway. Tayla was sensitive.)

Maybe it was just because I really, really enjoyed Sienna calling me increasingly erudite, complicated forms of “fatass”. Maybe it was because I wound up ordering a lot of ice cream. Or maybe it was because I got to see Tayla buck up and talk shit about people who were mean to her in high school, to one of the meanest, preppiest bitches in the world. But I really fucking enjoyed myself.

“You’re like one of those frosting guns.” Sienna said in a disgusted voice as she watched my belly bulge out and touch the table, “If I squeezed you, ass-end up, all the sugar you cram into your face would we could add food coloring.”

“Shut up Sienna…” I gasped, struggling with the wetness of my bikini bottom squishing between my fat thighs, “God, give a girl a minute to catch her breath.”

“What, you’re not that fast.” Sienna bit into her second sundae (a smaller, more manageable sized one that would nonetheless wind up helping dome out her belly at the end of the night), “My Great Aunt Tammy’s been dead for three years and her breath could still probably catch you, wide-load.”

I had to excuse myself to the restroom. I was gone for about twenty minutes while I took care of myself in the sizable handicap stall (thank God it wasn’t just a one-roomer). And when I had gotten back, beet-red and exhausted from struggling to get to the proper angles, I was greeted with the sight of my party; Sienna with a single cone and Tayla looking especially proud of herself.

“Watching you two clog your arteries has been great and all, but I’m gonna head out.” Sienna said with a bored look behind her shades, a little chocolate on the corner of her mouth as she stood at the end of the table, “What do I owe you for the ice cream?”

“Nothing!” Tayla answered a little too quickly, “I, um… you know.”

“We invited you.” I panted as I settled back down, “You know, just… don’t worry about it.”

“Get us next time.” Tayla helpfully added, a smile bunching her chubby cheeks.

“Next time, huh?” Sienna sneered—licking at her ice cream cone, “Yeah, okay.”

I watched her big butt saunter away, feeling the fun drain out of the evening. Her words literally seemed to fade from my mind as she got further and further away. It was sick and weird, but I forgot how much I really enjoyed it when she let loose on me. I’d never been in a good enough place to be able to sit down and take it all in. Just soak up all of the snide comments and rude remarks about my body. But knowing just how fucking fat I was gonna get… and what we were gonna do to her…

Something about it made it so, so hot.

“Jesus Christ did you pass out in there?” Tayla asked after I’d settled my enormousness back down into my seats, “You were gone for like half an hour—you missed me talking her into a cone for the road!”

“Yeah, I… almost.” I panted

“What were you…” Tayla curled her nose, “Doing in there?”

“Just…” I gasped, getting red in the face, “Nevermind. Let’s get out of here. Head back to your place. I’m exhausted.”

Tayla’s mom wasn’t home that night either. Which was a shame, because, I really hadn’t gotten my fill of people looking at me like I was the biggest, fattest thing in the universe.

Tayla had gotten used to my size—or at least, she’d gotten used to it as much as she could. She still got bug-eyed whenever I ate a small army’s worth of food, or whenever I showed off just how big my belly could get when I went all out. But Sienna’s teasing me had gotten me more worked up than I had any idea what to do with. And since I wasn’t about to finger myself in Tayla’s living room, I did all I could do.

I ate.

“This is going to be another one of those nights when I have to explain to my Mom why there’s literally no food in the house, isn’t it?” Tayla grunted as she let the huge haul of snack foods fall from the folds of her flabby arms, “I can tell by the fact that you’re taking time to laugh at me that, yes, it is.”

“Why should tonight be different from the other time?”

“Or the time before that, or the time before that.” Tayla rolled her eyes, waddling over to plop down on the sofa opposite to me, “Mom says that I’m not allowed to bring you over here more than twice a week.”

“It’ll be okay.” I said in a deep voice, smacking my lips as hunger and lust made me all foggy, “When we move into the dorms, we’ll have food all the time.”

“Gooood living with you is gonna make me so fat.” Tayla whined, gripping her belly with both hands beneath her swimsuit, “Why are you so persuasive?!”

“I’m not persuasive.” I grunted, breathing heavy, “Contagious.”

“Let’s fucking hope so.” Tayla harrumphed as she tucked into a bag of Oreos, leaning back into the couch, “Sienna isn’t gonna make herself fat.”

“She might.” I managed. Chips, cookies, and oatmeal crème pies managing to find their way into my belly, “She ate those two sundaes.”

“You think so?” Tayla asked hopefully, rolling to the side to reach for the remote underneath her ample amounts of ass

“Everyone’s gotta start somewhere.”

“You want me to find another pair of my Mom’s pajamas?”

“Please—this bikini nonsense is getting fucking old.”

***


And, you know, this kind of thing continued for a while.

It seemed like a really weird way to start a friendship, but I was honestly glad that Tayla had messaged me. Looking back, I don’t know why we didn’t hang out more in high school. She was fun, and she was always down for a good meal. And that ultimately came back to bite her in the ass, considering she wasn’t as into being an enormous ball of lard like yours truly, but I digress

Obviously, we tried our best to stick to Sienna Collins like glue. We started going to the Shack again after we’d made nice and made sure that we were going to all be able to get along… well enough. We weren’t going to be getting matching tattoos any time soon, but Tayla was almost as hooked to the idea of Sienna Collins becoming one of the fat girls she tormented in high school as I was to the top-tier tubby teasing that she’d spit my way at every opportunity.

Ten pounds short of weighing more than some industrial equipment was enough to make me want to put down everything and do nothing until I’d eaten myself a full ten pounds heavier.

Which made me absolute shit as a roommate on day one.

“You know…” Tayla gasped, drenched with sweat, “You could help me a little!”

I had spent the morning parked on my bed in my part of the dorm room, slowly tucking away into my snack stash. It was the only real thing that I’d moved from my mom’s house successfully into the (frankly fucking dinky) dorm room on campus. Tayla had been a super champ and had done her best in helping keep me sedentary so I didn’t burn off any precious calories, but even she had her limits. Less than half my size and full of nothing but quivering, jiggling blubber with no muscle to speak of, she was hardly in any shape to be doing it by herself.

“You’re such a pig, Nikki.” Tayla gasped as she collapsed onto the couch in the living room, shouting so that I could hear her from the next room, “Get off your fat ass and help me move your shit into our dorm!”

“Come over and make me, fatass!” I shouted, sticking my cute pink tongue out for all to see

“That’s it wide-load…”

For as sensitive about her weight as she was, Tayla sure could be a pig when she needed to be. Or when she didn’t need to be, for that matter. She liked to blame me for the extra fifty-ish (emphasis on the -ish) pounds that had widened her frame since we started hanging out way back when Summer started. Almost all of it had gone to that belly of hers—though not without some runoff to her tits. She’d crested north of three hundred pounds last time we checked (she simply sighed the night we’d done our weigh in and said “figures”) and it really showed in how low her belly rolled these days. Her face had chubbed up something fierce, her neck slowly rolling underneath her second chin and chubby cheeks.

Hey, I warned her what would happen.

Watching her waddle towards me, every inch of those pounds became apparent. She was slower, fatter, and lazier after I’d taken her under my flabby wing. But that didn’t stop her from coming over to tickle me into submission.

“Stop!” I bellowed, my chest heaving with laughter, “I’m gonna pee!”

Seven hundred pounds at nineteen years old, freshman year of college.

I was literally already at the limit of what my campus’s disability services could offer me at the time. My dorm was fucking tiny compared to me—and frankly, compared to Tayla. By the time I was done with her, we’d both be eating this campus out of house and home.

As we both finally waddled downstairs, fully intent on abusing our unlimited meal plan, you’d get a better idea of what I meant.

Look, as much as I hated to admit it, I was impressed by Sienna a lot of the time.

Not only was she apparently a born fat ass, but she managed to pack away as much food as tubby Talya and keep up conversation. I’m pretty sure that if it weren’t for her, me and Talya would have spent most of our mealtimes in silent hoggish bliss, just stuffing ourselves. Or stuffing me. Preferably stuffing me.

That fat mouth of hers made for decent conversation, even if there were crumbs spewing out of it. Grease dribbling down the corners. Flickers of sauce on her stupid, pink lips.

But even after about two hours, fully marking the transition from “brunch” to “lunch” in the dining hall’s agenda, I was beginning to get full. I hadn’t skipped breakfast for starters, and the fact that my snack stash already needed to be topped off might have had something to do with it. I had spent literally all morning eating, and now that it was eeking towards one in the afternoon, it was getting more accurate to say that I had spent all day stuffing my fat face. Something that I was pretty damn proud about, if you hadn’t figured that out.

“Jesus Christ Nikki, how are you still eating?” Sienna sneered from across the table, “Are you planning on emptying out the whole cafeteria?”

“Knowing her, I wouldn’t be surprised.” Talya puffed as she leaned back in her chair, round belly resting comfortably on her pillar-thick thighs, “You should have seen her this morning—I went and got biscuits and this bitch had the nerve to ask me to go back and get more!”

“You only got me five.” I panted, suckling on a turkey leg as my appetite started to kick, “You… you know better…”

It wouldn’t have been the first time I’d made a hog out of myself in front of my friends. But they always acted surprised when the nearly seven hundred pound girl, spreading across two wide chairs in the cafeteria, had the audacity to eat to her heart’s content. And my heart wouldn’t be contented by anything less than a fuckton of food. Especially when I had the best audience that a fat girl like me could ask for.

“Fucking A, no wonder you’re a walking landfill. I’ve seen your snack stash, you pig.” Sienna’s round face curled maliciously as she watched me put down the leg and choke down the last of my mashed potatoes, “I’d be impressed if it weren’t so fucking sad.”

“Shut up Sienna.” I panted, my approval undercut by the fact that my capacity was starting to wane

“You think that’s impressive?” Talya smiled at me devilishly, “You should hear everything she’s eaten today.”

I could only make a low, throaty noise as my flabby arms pumped food into my mouth a little faster. Talya had long discovered the link between my kinks. And sometimes—sometimes—she played a little fast and loose.

“What, is it fucking itemized?” Sienna scoffed, trying to discreetly steal a cookie from what remained of my plate

“It might as well be.” Talya belly-laughed, “So there’s the five biscuits from this morning—“

Talya held up a chubby pointer finger to count on. God, five biscuits was just one finger. How much had I eaten today? I had honestly lost count.

“A bag of Oreos. Two tubes of Pringles.” Talya held up another two stubby fingers, “A box of Swiss Cake Rolls.”

“Jesus.” Sienna’s dimples creased as she gawked

“Then there’s…” Talya gestured to the graveyard that was our lunch table, “All this.”

“All this.” Sienna snorted, chubby cheeks rippling at my expense, “Who remembers everything that the vaccum sucks up after you clean the whole campus?”

“F-Fuck off…” I panted, not stopping my Herculean hoovering

“Let’s try!” Talya put both of her hands on my meaty shoulders and gripped me, jostling me ever so slightly, “First there was the pizza.”

“Enough mashed potatoes to feed Ireland.”

As Talya’s list grew, item by item, my pace increased incrementally. Fuck, she knew how to push my buttons. Hearing everything that I’d shoved into my fat face all morning made it all sound like so much. No wonder I was full—I had been such a fatty. Such a big, fat, pig. Stuffing myself until I could barely waddle to the dining hall. Where I just ate more and more and more…

“Ohhh G-God…”

For being a more naïve, innocent breed of fat girl, Talya sure liked to get me hot and bothered when she could. I had my theories, but it was probably because deep down, she was just as much of a hog as I was. This way she got to enjoy it without being the size of a hog as I was.

That, and she liked to see Sienna squirm in her seat as much as I did.

“She’s a growing girl~” Talya sloshed my stomach from the crest down, letting loose a throaty moan from deep inside of me, “Don’t you think so, Sienna?”

Fuuuuck…

As Talya ran her hands along the curvature of my stomach and Sienna watched from the porky peanut gallery, it was all I could do to keep eating. My sex-crazed, food-addled brain told me to keep stuffing myself, even though my gut was rapidly losing space to put it all. I had already eaten so much, so so much…

sooo much…

As far as dorm rooms go, our college’s were pretty interchangeable. Sienna’s dorm room was a floor down from ours, and she shared it with her roommate Yolanda. Her colossal ass shimmied and shook, wobbling out of her wrecked yoga pants with every jiggling, heavy step.

If I hadn’t been stuffed to max capacity, forced to fucking speed walk down the hallways, I might have enjoyed it more.

“Happens to the best of us.” I gasped, clogging up Sienna’s couch with the acres of my fat ass, “Ain’t that right, Talya?”

“Do you fatsos think you could waddle down to the bookstore and pick me up some sweats?” I heard her from deep inside the closet, “I need something to wear and all my fucking clothes are too small.”

The truth of the matter was, in fact, that Sienna was too big. Her time with us had rapidly (rapidly) turned her into a two-hundred and fifty pounds porker. Bottom-heavy as could be, with flaring hips that she could see laying down. Her massive ass made her sit almost a half a foot higher than she had after graduation alone. Not to mention that chubby belly she’d gotten after sneaking off our plates…

“Fuck… I just sat down…” I gasped, meaty chest heaving

“Unless you’ve got something that’ll fit the tiny parasitic twin you’re harboring in that gut of yours Talya, it’s not gonna do me any fucking good!”

Standing in the doorway, Sienna’s saddlebag thighs and improbably thick legs were squared as she stood defiantly before us. Her belly rolled out from underneath her shirt, the distinct lower tier on display as the angry red mark where her waistband had been shone bright against her pale flesh.

God she was getting a really fat ass.

“Uh, don’t worry, they’re… old.” I struggled to form a coherent thought as Sienna’s supple shape eclipsed the doorway and any lingering thoughts of calling myself entirely heterosexual, “From Talya’s skinny days.”

“When were you skinny?” Sienna snarked as she waddled back into her bedroom, “Just… whatever. Bring them back here, okay? Then we need to go shopping like now. I’m not going to hang out in your hand-me-downs like some kind of slob. Even thick bitches like me gotta look good.”

Thick. Ha! Sienna still thought she was thick. I almost forgot about that.

Sienna was not thick. I mean, she might have been thick in the way that lead was thick. But make no mistake, Sienna had long and gone gotten fat by that point. I mean, I guess I could understand why she had trouble with the concept—she’d gone and doubled her weight in like a half a year. That was bound to take some catching up.

But no no no, Sienna was fat. And seeing her pout in her panties and a too-small t-shirt that let her tummy hang out, it was undeniable.

Hardly able to believe my luck, I settled my ass into a pair of plastic chairs and dug into a feast of food. The restaurant was an Italian place, so there was pizza, pasta, calzones, meatballs by the bucket, and, I realised as I bit into a slice of pepperoni, this was some of the greasiest, cheesiest, fattiest food I had ever eaten.

"Excellent as usual, charge it to my card, you know the details. Same time tomorrow?" The waitress nodded eagerly, and I could practically see the dollar signs in her eyes – Brianna was probably supporting this place all on her own. "Boys, wanna help me up?"

Two burly waiters took Brianna's hands and helped the gigantic girl to her feet. I struggled to do the same; I'd barely been so stuffed in a long time. Brianna saw how full I clearly was and laughed, even the fat in her cheeks jiggling. "Nikki, I think this could be the beginning of a beautiful friendship."

1552321212222111212122212122112122222122.content:
The donut place really was just round the corner, but I was winded by the time we reached it.

"Are you okay, Nikki?" Becky asked, concerned. She had bundled herself up in a coat and scarf for the walk over, but I had plenty natural insulation, plus this was more exercise than I'd taken in a long time, so I was plenty warm.

"I'm fine," I puffed. "I'm just more used to takeout." Since Sarah and I had had our epic blowout, we'd been leaving the room less and less, since she wanted to focus on gaining as much as possible and I was starting to struggle to fit through the average door. We pretty much knew the takeout menus of every place within a five-mile radius of campus by heart, and I was already missing my favourite seven or eight pizza joints... but then the donut shop came into view, and I got a surge of energy and started waddling towards its glowing double doors, the words 101 Donuts in neon above them.

I stopped in the middle of the shop, and as the outlying regions of my flab gradually came to a jiggling halt, I gazed up at the illuminated menu above the counter, the ultra-glossy images of the donuts calling out to me, the smell of them cooking filling my nose.

As I wiped away the drool from the corner of my mouth, Becky walked up to the counter, where a guy about my age was sitting on a stool behind the counter. He had a bit of a gut – who wouldn't, working here? – on which he balanced the battered paperback book he was reading, and his ears were covered by a pair of big black headphones, so he didn't seem to have noticed us enter. As Becky stood in front of him and waved to get his attention, he did look up, and smiled as he saw the buxom blonde housewife, her cheeks still pink from the cold.

"Hey, Mrs Hudson," he said, slipping off his headphones and coming over to the cash register, "haven't seen you since this morning. Did you decide to leave Mr Hudson and run away with me?"

Becky giggled. "I'm still mulling it over, Alvin," she said. "Busy night?"

"Yeah, so swamped," he said sarcastically, "I'm up to chapter sixt–whoa." Becky must have seen him staring, and looked over her shoulder to see me in all my monstrously fattened glory.

"Oh, uh, Alvin, this is my neighbor, Nikki," she said. I waved a flabby arm. Alvin was still staring, when Becky said, "So, I guess I'll have the usual then? And another for Nikki?"

Alvin managed to pull his eyes away, and said, slightly dazed, "Uh, sure. Take a seat, it's dead tonight so I'll bring them right to you."

The cheap metal-legged chairs looked pretty flimsy, so it was with care that I lowered myself across a full four of them. Becky sat on a single chair, but she did it gingerly, her plump ass hanging off both sides – the move to a two-chair butt was obviously pretty close.

"So what's the usual?" I asked, huge stomach grumbling.

"Oh, a dozen different ones, all my favorites," she said, taking off her coat and unwinding her scarf. "I know it's kind of indulgent, but –"

"Are you kidding?" I said. "A dozen? You're a fucking amateur. Oops, I mean, uh –"

Becky raised an eyebrow. "What, you think because I'm married you have to talk to me like I'm a schoolteacher? I'm not some dried-up old curtain-twitching bitch just yet, thank you."

"Noted," I said, a little impressed, just as Alvin came out from the back with two big boxes of donuts.

"Two Hudson Specials," he said, presenting them with a flourish. I grabbed mine from his hands and had crammed the first two into my mouth by the time Becky had said, "Thanks," and given him a dazzling smile. His eyes lingered on my vast bulk as he stammered, "Yuh, you're welcome," and left the table to return to his counter.

"He's such a cutie," said Becky when his earphones were safely back on. "You should date him. It's obvious he likes... bigger girls."

"You know, you can say 'fat', Becky," I said between donuts. "I've got a boyfriend, anyway. Besides, I think maybe he was more interested in you."

Becky blushed bright red, but she couldn't suppress a pleased smile. "Oh, don't be silly, it's just flirting. I'm a good customer," she said, wolfing down a honey-glazed donut, and quickly changed the subject. "So, a boyfriend, huh? What's his name?"

"Dan," I said, cramming another pair of chocolate frosted into my face and groaning. "God, these are so great!" I swallowed. "And, well... we haven't been talking much recently. I've been away at college, and he's so busy too..."

"Long distance can be tough," said Becky. "Try the cinnamon creme, I think they're my favorite."

I grabbed it, the last one left in my box, and devoured it in two bites – it was heavenly. "You've got good taste," I said, wiping a blob of the filling from my third chin. "Hey, Alvin!" I said, waving over at him. He looked up at once, and slipped off is headphones. "I want..."

"Hey, Alvin!" I said, waving over at him. He looked up at once, and slipped off is headphones. "Another box, next twelve flavors on the menu. Step on it!" I looked back at Becky's astonished face, grinning. "It's called 101 Donuts, right? Well, let's see what they've got."


After that, I was off. I devoured box after box, getting through plump, swollen, richly-filled donuts like they were nothing. After about the fourth box I started to slow, but it was the difference between total-starvation mode and normal Nikki-gorge mode, which is pretty indistinguishable to the naked eye. The Herman the Hog shirt had now ridden up so far it only covered my enormous boobs, and it was becoming increasingly covered in thick smears of cream and sugar. I always had two donuts in my hands, eating one as I reached for the next, and the next, and the next...

Increasingly, eating was becoming a whole-body activity for me, because when I moved my hugely thick arms, they rubbed against my boobs, and my boobs jiggled against the top of my gut, which made my love-handles wobble, which made my slab of back-fat quiver and my gigantic ass go totally crazy. No wonder I wasn't gaining as much weight as Sarah, think of all the precious calories I was burning! Still, it felt amazing, the incredible width of my butt shaking underneath me as I stuffed my fat face to my heart's content.

Finally Alvin came over with the next box, and I opened it to reveal – a paltry five donuts.

"Hey, hey!" I said, "what is this shit?"

"That's the last five flavors," he said, nervously. "Cherry pecan glazed, double toffee frosted, cinnanon peach jelly, and I don't know what those last two frostings were, the box was in Japanese, so I just spread it on."

I devoured the lot while he stood there, agog, licking my lips thoughtfully after the last two. "Nope, sorry," I said. "I don't know what the fuck that is. Pretty good though. Can I get a dozen of each to go?"

I looked across the table, strewn with boxes and crumbs, at a shocked Becky, who had got through a puny two boxes. "You ate a hundred and one donuts?" she said finally. "How does a person even get like this?"

I burped, and patted the thickest gut-roll I could reach. "Practice makes perfect."


We waddled back to our street together, I starting in on my first to-go box as we went. At the corner, I threw the empty container in the trash and yanked the second out from where I'd wedged it between my boobs and gut for safe-keeping, and started to feast on those squashed specimens.

"Well, that was... fun," said Becky, still amazed as I liked my sausage-fingers free of sugar. "Say, do you want to come over for breakfast tomorrow? I've got this extra-large waffle iron I got when I was online shopping last week. it just came today, I've been dying to try it out."

From then on, I was able to avoid my mom successfully most days. I'd tell her I was spending time with Dan, which I guessed was easy for her to believe, since we'd been apart for so long, but really I was going over to Becky's every day for breakfast, lunch and dinner, except when we went out for burgers or donuts. Becky must have really needed the company, because she didn't seem to mind one bit bringing me food until I was slumped on one of her sofas, which I took up in its entirety, my fat sides squishing against the arms waiting for my food coma to wear off in time for the next meal.

Not that she was just the waitress; the domestic porker seemed to take my presence as encouragement, or maybe it was just that next to me she felt like a dieting waif. Either way, her manicured fingers would wiggle gleefully over the plate of hot, fresh brownies and pluck one up for her to swallow in three chubby-cheeked mouthfuls before she handed them over to me, and she snacked constantly off the side of the plates she brought me. She had some real stamina, too – there was no way she was stopping at 250 pounds, and it surprised and slightly worried me how much I enjoyed the thought of my new friend's ass getting wider, her boobs getting bigger, her gut swelling... I supposed I was just transferring my glee at my own constant gain onto her as well. it wasn't just about taste or fullness, it was about feeling myself get fatter, and fatter, and fatter.

But it was too good to last. We were having dinner in her house, I plowing my way through an enormous chocolate bundt cake, when Becky, absently licking her fingers from the thick slice she'd just eaten, said, 'So, I guess we'll see each other in a couple days, then.'

I looked up from my face-feeding frenzy, startled. 'What about tomorrow?' I said.

'Tomorrow's Christmas, Nikki,' said Becky patiently. 'Remember?'

'Aw, shit,' I said. The whole day with my family? This was going to be a nightmare. And what would I wear? I thought, looking down at myself. Today I had on an outsize lumberjack shirt which I'd been able to do up two of the buttons on, and those buttons were now held between my tits and my top belly roll, giving me a near-illegal amount of cleavage, and my biggest sweatpants, which had gained a tear in the ass when I'd bent down to pick up a dropped cookie, but they were still the only thing that would fit me, so I wore them anyway, even though they took a good twenty minutes to fight my way into every day and flashed my straining panties whenever I took a thunderous step. But this wasn't something I could wear in front of my bitch cousin.

'Yeah, I know what you mean,' said Becky morosely. 'My folks are all the way across the country, so I'm going to my in-laws. It's tough enough getting along with them when Tyler's there, but now, it's just gonna be "pick-on-fat-Becky-mas" all day long. And they thought I was too heavy BEFORE...' She sighed, then brightened up. 'But before you go,' she said, as I finished the final crumbs of the bundt, 'I've got something for you.'

'Fmh mfh?' I said, still chewing the last huge mouthful of cake. I swallowed, burped, and wiped the crumbs from my mouth. 'I didn't get you anything! What is it?'

Becky reached down behind the couch and pulled out a gift-wrapped box. 'I know it's not Christmas yet, but I want to be here when you open it. Go on.'

I tore off the paper and opened the box. Inside was a tent-like mass of white cotton, and beneath it another huge marquee of black spandex. 'Fat clothes!' I said joyously, lifting up the t-shirt to reveal the slogan 'Keep Calm and Give Me Your Food'. The yoga pants beneath were also gigantic. I struggled to my feet and enveloped Becky in a gigantic fleshy hug. 'You're the best!'

'You're welcome,' she said, smiling as she extricated herself from my blubber-wave. 'I knew you were outgrowing a lot of your stuff, and you know I love that online shopping. I got them from behemothladies.com, they were the biggest sizes I could find. The owner of the site wears those pants, and she's 800 pounds, so they should last you a little while.'

'Couple of weeks, maybe,' I grinned, slapping my full gut. 'Well, at least I'll look half-dressed in front of my family tomorrow.'


We bid each other Merry Christmas, and I headed out across the road. One day with them wouldn't be so bad, and then they'd leave me alone again to EAT!

When I got in, however, Mom must have heard the rustling of the tarp, because she stuck her head out of the dining-room door and said, 'Nikki, there you are. I need to talk to you about something.'

Shit, here it comes. The you're-unbelievably-fat speech. 'Yeah, what?'

'Dan phoned here earlier today.'

'Ah.' Shit.

'He was looking for you to wish you a Merry Christmas. Seemed to think the two of you hadn't even spoken in weeks. So you can imagine my confusion, when I thought you were with him every day?' She put her hands on her hips and looked at me seriously. 'Young lady, why have you been lying to me.'

I paused, thinking about how to play this, and decided to go for the truth – sort of. 'Look, um – Dan and I have been having a few problems lately. But I didn't want you to worry, so I didn't tell you.' I hung my head, looking at where once I'd have been able to stare sullenly at my feet, but now all that met my eyes was an ocean of rippling cleavage. Good enough.

'Oh?' Mom said, eyebrows raised. 'So where have you been these past few days?'

'I've been hanging out with Becky – I mean, Mrs Hudson.'

Mom's face changed utterly. 'Mrs – you mean the neighbor woman? Oh!' Her expression softened. 'Well, that's all right, then.'

I looked up. 'Really?' It was that easy?

'Her husband's been gone a while now, she needs someone to talk to.' She peered at me curiously, but with a half-smile. 'Good for you for looking out for her.'


Not only had I gotten away with it, I thought as I stomped up to bed, I'd scored some points with Mom to boot. Anything was useful that might be leverage in getting more food tomorrow. I stripped off my clothes and climbed into the ruin of what was once my bed – I'd shattered it to splinters on my first night home, now it was just a mattress on some broken timber. Still, I had plenty of natural padding.

I woke up the next morning, not to the sound of reindeer hoofs on the roof, but the ringing doorbell.

'What the fuck?' I mumbled, drowsily hauling myself into a sitting position on the fourth try. Nobody seemed to be answering it. I looked at the clock. 8am! Who rings the doorbell at 8am on Christmas?

After a couple more wobbling false starts I got to my feet and managed to clamber into the new clothes Becky had got me. They were easy after some of the crowbar-like struggled I'd had with my jeans at college, so soon I was thundering down the stairs and opened the door to reveal...
